// frontend/src/pages/CustomerFormPage.js // ... (imports) ... function CustomerFormPage() { // ... (hooks: id, navigate, isEditing) ... // --- Update initial state to include currency --- const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', address: '', currency: 'USD', open_balance: 0.00 }); const [error, setError] = useState(''); const [success, setSuccess] = useState(''); // ... (useEffect to fetch customer data is fine) ... // ... (handleChange is fine) ... // ... (handleSubmit is fine) ... return (

{isEditing ? 'Edit Customer' : 'New Customer'}

 {error && {error}} {success && {success}} {/* Add margin bottom */} Name / Title * {/* --- Add Currency and Opening Balance --- */} Currency * Opening Balance {/* -------------------------------------- */}
{/* ... (Contact form fields are fine) ... */}
); } export default CustomerFormPage;
